example[1]: The Minister was kidnapped by armed men on his way to the airport.
example[2]: The prisoners were kept under armed guard.
example[3]: She got ten years in prison for armed robbery  (=stealing using a gun).
example[4]: The president fears that armed conflict  (=a war) is possible.
example[5]: There is very little support for an armed struggle  (=fighting with weapons) against the government.
example[7]: Many of the gangs are armed to the teeth  (=carrying a lot of weapons).
example[8]: The suspect is armed with a shotgun.
definition[1]: having the knowledge, skills, or equipment you need to do something
example[9]: She came to the meeting armed with all the facts and figures to prove us wrong.
example[10]: I went out, armed with my binoculars, to see what I could find in the fields.
